txt.en: 'Ah, Gandalf! Is it time?'
'Yes. The rest of your company is assembling at Frerin's Court.'
'...All but one, of course.'
'Of course, of course! This mysterious warrior of whom you speak so highly.'
'I look forward to meeting him....'
'...though Bilbo is an awfully strange name for a dwarf! He should be an interesting fellow.'
'That didn't sound stable to me....'
'[placeholder], will you help me get the miners out?'
Silverdeep Mine
Dwalin
'Your lord Thorin makes ready to go on a dangerous journey.'
'He asks me to advise him, but he is determined never to heed me.'
Miner
'Come, try your skill!'
'Thorin will not like my choice.'
'Balin and Dwalin, I believe it is time!'
'The final companion to join us will be a Burglar...a hobbit.'
'Ah, Gandalf. We'll be off then.'
'Bah! Don't look at me like that. Bilbo Baggins will make a better Burglar than even he knows.'
'Hail, Balin and Dwalin...it is time!'
'Thorin will balk, but he'll need Bilbo before the end.'
'Ah! We will make ready to leave.'
'The Lonely Mountain awaits!'
'Good day to you, Gl√≥in. The others are making ready to depart.'
'That is good news! I am weary of planning and waiting.'
'There is a dragon to be bested, and treasure to be reclaimed!'
'Have a safe journey, father!'
'I'll go get help, Gimli!'
'I wish you a safe and prosperous journey!'
'I bid you a safe journey and a prosperous return, Master Thorin!'
'Farewell, Gimli!'
'What in the--?'
'That mine should be stable! What could be causing that?'
'We must get the miners out! Come, [placeholder] -- let's go into the mine.'
'I'll go get help. Be safe, lads!'
'That will have to do....'
'Follow me, [placeholder]!'
'But Bilbo is an awfully strange name for a dwarf. He should be an interesting fellow.'
'But hush -- let us say no more of the matter. Thorin is near.'
'Hail, Thorin Oakenshield! I am at your service, and your good family's, of course.'
'Ah, Gandalf! Is it time?'
Gimli
'Ah, Gandalf! Is it time?'
'Yes. The rest of your company are assembled at Frerin's Court....'
'...All but one, of course.'
'Of course, of course! This mysterious warrior you have chosen. I look forward to meeting him!'
'Gormr, my trusted friend!'
'You are hereby appointed Steward of these Halls in my absence.'
'I shall see you on my return, son! Much honour will be restored to our family.'
'Ah, Gandalf! Is it time?'
